Contributor: Thomas, Bert, artist.; Hill, Siffken & Co., printer.;
Note: Signed "Bert Thomas." Date based on dates of 1st World War. "No. 72" appears on the bottom left of illustration. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to buy war bonds so there will be enough ammunition. Illustration shows a shadowed depiction of a serviceman standing next to big cannons.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Savings bonds -- Great Britain.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.;

Title: War bonds
